original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Āsavasampayuttaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: āsava sampayuttam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Āsavavippayuttaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naāsavasampayutto naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: āsava vippayuttam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na āsava sampayuttaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
